---
title: Submit a Signed Split Stake Account Transaction for Broadcast
slug: /staking/solana/split-stake-account/submit-signed-split-stake-account-transaction
---

After signing the transaction, send a `PUT` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]/next` with the signed payload.
The Staking API will broadcast the transaction to the Solana network.

### Parameters

- `name` &mdash; `string` Name of the action to execute (required).
- `inputs` &mdash; `object`
  - `transaction_payload` &mdash; Signed transaction payload from the previous step's response.

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash {5-8}
curl -X PUT 'https://solana-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/81a57270-89b2-46d9-83b0-2b6138b556cd/next' \
-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>' \
-d '{
  "name": "sign_split_tx",
  "inputs": {
    "transaction_payload": ""
  }
}'
```

### Response

With the signed transaction provided, the Staking API will broadcast it to the network. As the transaction progresses towards confirmation, the returned state will be either:

- `split_tx_broadcasting` &mdash; Transaction has been broadcast and is awaiting confirmation.
- `completed` &mdash; Transaction has been confirmed and split is complete.

#### Sample Response

```json {4,7-8}
{
  "id": "81a57270-89b2-46d9-83b0-2b6138b556cd",
  "operation": "split_stake_account",
  "state": "split_tx_broadcasting",
  "actions": [
    {
      "name": "wait",
      "estimated_state_change_at": "2023-03-02T08:27:37.929Z",
      "inputs": []
    }
  ],
  "data": {
    "funding_account_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "source_stake_account_pubkey": "9UPYJp5pApSEaeCizrvqe6vx7hSj3ZPzVDLZHG4hxk3x",
    "amount": "1.0",
    "split_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "5HwSBZggASZfGbSsfeaoSwTG4Kz8V7njWaBWYkD3c4sjDtvtJGKAvdRozk5CdnMvL9Z98rDR3MUcx6neYJyEXWte",
      "status": null,
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [
        {
          "account_address": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
          "signature": ""
        }
      ],
      "block_time": null
    },
    "source_stake_authority_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "destination_stake_account_pubkey": "XD7o3qSrZr6GJJnZ1s4ks3yDsHuso4Z9pSXy5VPLNLG"
  },
  "network_code": "solana",
  "chain_code": "devnet",
  "created_at": "2023-03-02T08:24:44.629Z",
  "updated_at": "2023-03-02T08:26:36.620Z"
}
```
